title: Setting up Grunt for Nav data

cells.data:
1. Install Node from nodes.org
  2. Open Terminal in your home directory
  3. sudo npm install -g grunt-cli (enter password when prompted)
  4. Make sure you cd to github grunt directory
  5. sudo npm install (to install dependencies)
The above steps are performed once - the steps below are run every time the nav data must be updated
  1. grunt (to run grunt and build the navigation object)
  2. CopyÂ docs-nav-data.min.js in the /dist directory to BCL-Content/docs/en/scripts/ (overwrite the existing file)
